title: Looking to join a ranked team
body:
Just as the title suggests, I'm looking for a ranked team to join, I may be a low ranked player (silver 5), but I am seriously looking to improve in everything, and I work really well in a team environment.

Can play any role, with mid and top being my best role.

would like to have high ranking players (silver 3 - diamond 1) in a team who would help their team mates get better not only in the team games, but in general gameplay.

Thank you for your time

replies.body: Ay man, I'm looking to start a ranked team once iv got enough players, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. Your match history with mid/top laners looks pretty good and if you don't mind playing with a less experienced player thats a quick learner, then hit us up if you're keen to join. IGN: CastielZaim11
